articles.title: Head of WPK Delegation Meets First Vice-General Secretary of Islamic Coalition Party of Iran
articles.content:
Head of WPK Delegation Meets First Vice-General Secretary of Islamic Coalition Party of Iran
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between Ryu Myong Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, who is leading its delegation on a visit to Iran, and Seyed Mehdi Joulaee, first vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, on Monday.
					 The head of the WPK delegation referred to the fact that the DPRK succeeded in the test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 under the personal guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and the WPK and the people of the DPRK have achieved unprecedented miracles in the building of a powerful socialist nation, firmly defending the sovereignty of the country with the single-minded unity and powerful military capability for self-defence.
					
					 He appreciated the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran for staunchly countering the sanctions and pressure of the U.S. and Western countries, stressing the need to develop the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties forged in the joint anti-imperialist struggle for independence.
					
					 The first vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran said that President Kim Il Sung met Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran, when visiting the DPRK. He said the friendly relations between the two parties and two countries have steadily grown stronger.
					
					 The WPK delegation's visit to Iran is an expression of support and solidarity for Iran, he noted, adding that the Iranian people, together with the Korean people, will struggle against the persistent moves of the U.S. and Western countries to isolate and stifle Iran and the DPRK.
					
					 Iran is rejoiced as its own over the successful ICBM test-fire of the DPRK, he stated, expressing the firm will to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties.
					
					 On the same day the WPK delegation was invited to a reception hosted by the first vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran.

articles.title: Results of Group G Matches for 2018 AFC U-23 Championship Qualifiers (1)
articles.content:
Results of Group G Matches for 2018 AFC U-23 Championship Qualifiers (1)
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Group G matches for the 2018 AFC U-23 Championship Qualifiers began at the May Day Stadium in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, from Wednesday.
					 Following are the results of the first-day matches.
					
					 DPRK : Hong Kong of China 1:1
					
					 Laos : Taipei of China 3:1

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals who made signal contributions to the building of an economic giant and the improvement of the people's standard of living, with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.
					 The title of academician was conferred on Kim Ji Yong, dean of a faculty of University of Sciences, and the title of candidate academician on Han Chung Hwan, teacher at Pyongyang Medical College under Kim Il Sung University, and Jon Ha Chol, president of the Academy of Social Sciences.
					
					 Professorship went to Pyon Kyu Sun, president of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Jon Ji Hyon, dean of a faculty of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Han Song Nam, head of a department of Pyongyang University of Dramatic and Cinematic Arts, and others
					
					 Doctorate was awarded to Jin Jae Gyong, head of a department of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Ui Song, a researcher at Pyongyang Medical College under Kim Il Sung University, Yu Song Chol, head of a department of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Ho Nam Chol, dean of a faculty of Kim Chol Ju University of Education, Han Pok Nam, head of a department of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Kyong Chol, vice-dean of a faculty of Pyongyang University of Architecture, and others. The title of assistant professor went to 126 intellectuals and that of master to 878 persons.

articles.title: More Remains Buried in War Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
More Remains Buried in War Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- More remains of martyrs were buried in the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery with due ceremony on Wednesday, ahead of the war victory day.
					 Those martyrs glorified their lives on the road for freedom and independence of the country and implementation of the cause of Songun revolution.
					
					 They include DPRK Heroes Yun Hi Chon and Ri Hung Gyu who took active part in the movement of aircraft-hunting teams to shoot down many enemy planes during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 After the war they had reliably upheld the idea and guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il with arms and fully discharged their mission and duty as revolutionary forerunners and educators to the last moments of their lives.
					
					 Among them is also Hero Jo Myong Su, who served in the public security organ in Ongjin County and made contributions to arresting at least 420 spies and hostile elements and capturing weapons and bullets during the war.
					
					 Wives of martyrs Yun Hi Chon, Ri Hung Gyu, Jo Myong Su, Choe Un Hong, Jon Ki Ryon, Jo Pyong Gi, Cha Yun Chan, Kim Yong Gu, Ryang In Gil, Hong Sung Chol, Hwang Pyong Song, Kim Won Jin and Ro Song Chil had honors to glorify their eternal lives together with their husbands. They had been faithful to the Party as being reliable companions of their husbands in the struggle to defend the country and socialism.

articles.title: Officials and Members of UAWK Start Tour of Mt Paektu Area
articles.content:
Officials and Members of UAWK Start Tour of Mt Paektu Area
 Hyesan, July 19 (KCNA) -- Officials and primary information workers of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea started their tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu in the run-up to the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 A kick-off ceremony took place in front of the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo in Hyesan City on Wednesday.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hyesan City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The reporter and speakers at the ceremony stressed that through the tour, all participants should more deeply grasp the greatness and undying feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu.
					
					 They said that they would fully display the revolutionary comradeship and collectivist lifestyle just like the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners and always live just as the anti-Japanese guerrillas did and thus prepare themselves as true officials in the great era of Kim Jong Un possessed of the revolutionary spirit of Mt Paektu and spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, members of the tour team went round the monument.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on July 17 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on him.
					 The conferment of the title of Marshal of the Republic upon you was a historic event of great significance in giving a steady continuity to the Songun revolution pioneered and led by the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and bringing earlier the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 You made sure that the country ranked itself among a few nuclear possessors and satellite manufacturers and launchers of the world and upgraded the position of the country to the world's most powerful inter-continental ballistic rocket possessor through the successful test-fire of Hwasong-14.
					
					 During the past five historic years, you recorded the legendary epic of valuing the people and respecting and loving them, thus glorifying the country as the people's paradise in which the people's first principle is embodied.
					
					 Chongryon officials and Korean residents in Japan more firmly enshrine the faith that the happiness of Koreans in Japan will be guaranteed before long along with the prospering country in which all dreams and ideals of the people are coming true.
					
					 Chongryon will actively join in the grand advance for the reunification of the Koreans according to the proposal for national reunification clarified by you and make tangible contributions to building a powerful socialist country by displaying patriotic loyalty.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on July 17 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on him.
					 The letter said that the conferment of the title of DPRK Marshal upon Kim Jong Un was the brilliant realization of the unanimous will and wishes of the Korean nation and a national historic event that provided a sure guarantee for glorifying the socialist country forever. 
					
					 The respected Marshal made sure that a steady continuity was given to the revolutionary history of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the letter said, adding that he has further developed Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism into the guiding ideology of the DPRK and brought about a fresh victory of the Songun revolution.
					
					 He has reliably defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation and brought into a brilliant reality the great Generalissimos' desire of building a powerful country and thus turned the socialist country into a paradise full of the people's happiness, the letter added.
					
					 The great success in the test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14, in particular, was a great victory won by the patriotic devotion of respected Marshal and his iron gut and pluck, the letter said, stressing that it was a great national event which terminated the U.S. imperialists' ceaseless nuclear blackmail and threat and guaranteed the eternal future of Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 The letter said that the officials of the General Association of Koreans in China and all other Koreans in China would uphold the leadership of the respected Marshal only in single mind without the slightest vacillation despite whatever change in the situation.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued
Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a new stamp (one sheet) to commemorate the 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					 Seen on the upper part of the sheet are letters "The 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union" and "June 6, Juche 106 (2017)" and on its center a photo of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un among participants in the congress.
					
					 A KCU badge, a red tie and sunflowers printed on the sheet symbolize the happy life of the KCU members who are growing up to be qualified intellectually, morally and physically with nothing to envy in the world under the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Animal-Peptide Foodstuffs Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Animal-Peptide Foodstuffs Produced in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory in the DPRK recently developed and began producing animal-peptide nutritive foodstuffs.
					Its products were highly appreciated at the 32nd national sci-tech festival and the Pyongyang International Sci-Tech Exhibition of Health and Domestic Medical Appliances.
					
					Through several years of research, its technicians and scientists from relevant units set a number of parameters for the production of peptide foodstuffs and determined the reasonable ratio of confectionary raw materials to peptide.
					
					On this basis, the factory developed nearly ten kinds of peptide nutritive foodstuffs, including cake, milk caramel and jelly, and put their production on an industrial basis.
					
					 In this regard, Yun Pyong Song, a workshop head of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					Their application to children in different areas including Pyongyang City proved that they are 1.4-1.5 times higher than other functional foodstuffs in enrichment on an average or 2.2 times to the maximum. And they are highly regarded to be good for sportspersons and the old.
					
					It was confirmed that animal-peptide nutritive foodstuffs bring about mprovements in children's nutrition, promote their growth and have effects of normalizing blood sugar, lowering blood pressure and taking strong antibiotic action.
					
					Now, the factory strives to increase the varieties of nutritive foodstuffs.

articles.title: Korean Youths and Students from Japan Meet Unconverted Long-Term Prisoner
articles.content:
Korean Youths and Students from Japan Meet Unconverted Long-Term Prisoner
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Korean youths and students in Japan led by Kim Chol Ho met Ri Kong Sun, an unconverted long-term prisoner who is an indomitable pro-reunification patriot, on Wednesday.
					 Ri said that his absolute trust in the Party and leader and invincible faith were the essential source of strength that helped him preserve his revolutionary integrity, overcoming unimaginable torture and appeasement of decades.
					
					 He noted that unconverted long-term prisoners are enjoying a worthwhile and happy life under the warm loving care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is identical to the great leaders.
					
					 He expressed belief that members of the delegation would steadily carry forward the patriotic tradition of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, remaining loyal to the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Saying that they are greatly encouraged by pro-reunification patriotic fighters' indomitable fighting spirit, the head of the delegation declared that they would prepare themselves as the pillars shouldering the movement of the Koreans in Japan with the iron faith that they guided by Kim Jong Un are sure to win.
					
					 There was an art performance at the meeting.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces Last-ditch Efforts of Remnants of Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces Last-ditch Efforts of Remnants of Park Geun Hye Group
Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Now south Korean politics is in total chaos owing to the remnants of the Park Geun Hye group.
					 Shortly ago, conservatives formed the "Korean Patriotic Party" representing "new rightwing political party". They insisted that they would "probe the truth behind the impeachment of Park Geun Hye and launch a signature campaign claiming acquittal of Park".
					
					 These reckless acts of the conservative remnants forsaken by the people are open challenge to the mindset of the candlelight demonstrators of south Korea and the last-ditch efforts to turn back the wheel of history. 
					
					 Like the "Liberal Korea Party", "Parun Party" and "Saenuri Party", the "Korean Patriotic Party" is also the group of human scum who committed all kinds of despicable crimes under Park Geun Hye.
					
					 All the members of the group are human derelicts who faced denunciation from south Koreans by opposing impeachment of peerless witch Park, holding her as dear as their ancestral tablet and claiming her release.
					
					 As for Jo Won Jin, elected as co-representative of the party, is the best lackey of traitor Park being called as "strong pro-Park element".
					
					 When Park was ousted from Chongwadae, he held a confab at an inner room of Samsong-dong in Seoul to reverse the situation. He was a candidate from the "Saenuri Party" made by conservative gangsters, who sponsored a rally against Park's impeachment, during the "presidential election".
					
					 Co-representative of the party Ho Phyong Hwan is also the wicked conservative who took the lead in the racket to eliminate the "followers of the north" and in the confrontation with the compatriots as chairman of an ultra-right body, depending on Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The nature of the despicable party is as clear as noonday.
					
					 Different conservative parties were produced from the dirty remnants of Park, more dead than alive. Even the party appeared under the signboard of "patriotism" to make south Korean society dirty and it is inviting bitter denunciation from south Korean people.
					
					 The cesspool poisoning circumstances should be buried in time. The groups of confrontation maniacs and depraved guys challenging the mindset of candlelight demonstrators should never be allowed to revive.
					
					 No matter how desperately they may try, dreaming of retaking the power, they can never escape from the destiny to be buried in the tomb of history together with traitor Park.

articles.title: Songun Politics Is Banner for Winning Steady Victories of Korean Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun Politics Is Banner for Winning Steady Victories of Korean Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Songun politics is the basic socialist political mode of leader Kim Jong Il style giving priority to military affairs and strengthening the driving force of the revolution with the People's Army as core and main force and victoriously advancing socialist construction. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Songun politics serves as the banner for winning steady victories by firmly defending the security of the country and the people from all challenges and aggressive moves of the hostile forces and a weighty treasured sword consolidating the unity of the army and people as firm as a rock.
					
					 It serves as the motive power for making leap forward as it paved a broad avenue to building a powerful socialist country by dint of self-reliance and self-development. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership has been the basic source of strength that enabled to firmly defend the country and the revolution and socialism of Juche from the vicious moves of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces by increasing the overall national power in every way and build a springboard for a powerful socialist country despite so rigorous trials.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun politics the lineage of the Korean revolution has been given a steady continuity and self-esteem and prestige of the DPRK remarkably enhanced.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is building up tremendous strength for the final victory in the showdown with the U.S. and the building of a powerful socialist nation, invariably following the road of Songun taken by Kim Jong Il all his life.
					
					 Witnessing the eye-opening reality in which the great victories and innovations of the nation are taking place in succession, all the service personnel and people of the DPRK are firmly convinced that Songun politics is the all-powerful treasured sword for translating all dreams and ideals of the people into realities.

articles.title: Last-ditch Efforts of Remnants of Park Geun Hye Group Slashed
articles.content:
Last-ditch Efforts of Remnants of Park Geun Hye Group Slashed
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The remnants of the Park Geun Hye group driven into the tight corner are making desperate efforts to prolong their dirty remaining days. Those professing "orthodox pro-Park" elements recently set up the "Korean Patriotic Party" at a recent "meeting of promoters of conservative new party" at the hall of the puppet National Assembly.
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Wednesday brands this as a last-ditch effort of the remnants of the Park Geun Hye group keen on turning back the wheel of history as it is a vicious challenge to the candlelight demonstrators.
					
					 The "Korean Patriotic Party" includes human scum who drew denunciation and derision from the people for their opposition to impeachment of Park and for demanding her acquittal and discharge while holding the matchless dragon lady as dear as their ancestral tablet, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is a political cartoon that the remnants of history made a great fuss, while setting up a conservative new party, and making a bluff, to give impression they would get Park released at once.
					
					 The dirty traitors who go about with their heads up will only emit offensive smell as they committed thrice-cursed crimes while clinging to the coattails of outsiders and Park Geun Hye. The puppet conservative group has to be taken to the grave of history for the sake of the nation and even in the light of the desire and wish of the south Koreans.
					
					 The ruin of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors is its unavoidable fate.

articles.title: U.S. Is Arch Criminal Escalating Nuclear Arms Race: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Is Arch Criminal Escalating Nuclear Arms Race: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Stockholm International Peace Research Institute recently made public a fact-finding report on the world's nuclear arsenals. According to it, the U.S. is mulling spending 400 billion dollars to maintain and update nuclear weapons for ten years from 2017 and trillion dollars to modernize nuclear weapons for 30 years, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 This suggests that the U.S. imperialists' desperate nuclear arms race has reached a very dangerous phase to hold the unchallenged nuclear edge over potential rivals as blatant challenge to global peace and security. 
					
					 The U.S. scenario for aggression and domination of its nuclear policy remains unchanged as it regards nuclear weapons as all-round means necessary to violate the sovereignty of different countries.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal escalating the arms race and increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The only way to defuse the danger of a nuclear war and preserve peace on the Korean peninsula is for the DPRK to bolster up nuclear deterrent for self-defense at the rapid speed.
					
					 The DPRK will steadily bolster up its nuclear deterrent both in quality and quantity in order to fundamentally put an end to the danger of a nuclear war increased by the U.S. and preserve peace in the region and other parts of the world.

articles.title: Moves for THAAD Deployment Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Moves for THAAD Deployment Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Residents and other civic and public organizations and religionists of Songju County, North Kyongsang Province, south Korea held a rally in Sosong-ri on July 13, on the lapse of a year after the south Korean Defense Ministry announced the plan to deploy U.S. THAAD in Songju County, according to News 1 and other south Korean media reports.
					 The participants disclosed the danger of THAAD deployment and expressed the will to more vigorously launch the struggle for THAAD withdrawal.
					
					 Seminars, rallies and other events of civic and public organizations and personages against the illegal and unilateral moves of the U.S. and south Korean authorities for THAAD deployment took place across south Korea on the same day.

articles.title: S. Korean Drivers Demand Improved Labor Conditions
articles.content:
S. Korean Drivers Demand Improved Labor Conditions
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Public Transport and Service Trade Unions under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference in Seoul on July 14 in demand of improved labor conditions for bus drivers, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers said now drivers worked 18 hours without shift a day and traffic accidents would continue as long as the management side force unlimited service.
					
					 They urged the authorities to take measures such as banning overtime work.

articles.title: Torrential Rain Hits S. Korea
articles.content:
Torrential Rain Hits S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- South Korea was hit hard by torrential rain, according to reports from Seoul.
					 South and North Chungchong and south Korean Kangwon provinces were hit hard by torrential rain, in particular.
					
					About 4,960 hectares of cultivated land and dwelling houses of nearly 700 blocks were inundated as of now and human losses are increasing.

articles.title: GI's Gender Violence against S. Korean Woman
articles.content:
GI's Gender Violence against S. Korean Woman
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean MBC on July 14, a service member in the Osan U.S. air force base sexually abused a south Korean woman in Kangnam District, Seoul City on April 1, sparking off public uproar.

articles.title: Ki m Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Russian internet homepage Patrioti Moskva posted the full-text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" on July 5 to observe the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					It also indicates the tasks for resolutely defending the idea and exploits of the great leaders and adding luster to them forever.
					
					 Posted on the website was a photo of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Algeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Algeria
Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Tarzalt Publishing House in El-Djezair of Algeria brought out in pamphlet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on July 6.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Remembrance meetings, round-table talks, lectures and reading sessions took place in Iceland, Ethiopia and Angola from June 26 to 29.
					
					 The general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society praised Kim Il Sung for performing immortal feats before the times and history.
					
					 Figures of the Construction Design and Supervisory Complex of Ethiopia, the Oromia Designing Supervisory Office and other units of Ethiopia noted that as Kim Il Sung sincerely helped African countries in their struggle for national liberation and the building of new society, he is always remembered by the Ethiopian people, adding that he was the sun of Africa, indeed.
					
					 In the events held in Angola, the speakers praised Kim Il Sung as an outstanding politician, ever-victorious brilliant commander, tender-hearted father of all people and a peerlessly great sage.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Syrian Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Syrian Media
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Syrian media carried special write-ups on July 6 and 8 on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Syria TV Channel reported about the immortal exploits performed by the President before the country, the people, the era and history, illustrated with his photos dealing with his revolutionary activities.
					
					 Radio Syria aired a special report praising the world-historic merits of the President who always lives in the hearts of all people as the sun of Juche
					
					 The SANA introduced in detail the exploits the President performed in liberating Korea and winning the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath highly praised the President for setting forth outstanding military idea and strategies and tactics and leading the confrontation with imperialism to victory.
					
					 The Syrian papers Al Thawrah and Tishrin also lauded the President for making a great contribution to carrying out the Korean revolution and accomplishing the global cause of independence.

articles.title: Nigerian Figure Praises Successful Test-launch of Hwasong-14
articles.content:
Nigerian Figure Praises Successful Test-launch of Hwasong-14
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, co-chairman of the international preparatory committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and chairman of the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, released a statement on July 7 as regards the successful test-launch of the DPRK's ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 He said:
					
					 The great successful test-launch of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 gives fresh confidence and hope to the progressive people as it serves as brilliant victory of the indomitable faith and will of the Korean people who advanced, upholding the banner of Songun without any vacillation despite arbitrary, brutal and unprecedented provocations of the U.S. and its vassal forces and manifold trials for several decades.
					
					 This special event clearly proved that nothing can ever block the road of the Korean people dynamically advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, united close around HE Marshal Kim Jong Un, respected Supreme Leader.
					
					 The U.S. should opt for improving the relations with the DPRK by concluding a peace accord, well aware of its strategic position and reality, and the progressive people should become more vocal supporting the principled and peace-loving stand of the Korean people for defending peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.

articles.title: Russian Online Magazine on Korea's Eye-opening Reality
articles.content:
Russian Online Magazine on Korea's Eye-opening Reality
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) ? The Russia's online magazine Lemchich on July 11 carried an article titled "Korea's reality: it is developing" written by a British person.
					 The article said:
					
					 The test-launch of ICBM successfully conducted by the DPRK showed the world that the DPRK is undergoing rapid development of economy and science and technology, instead of being at economic crisis.
					
					 The DPRK's economy is developing at breakneck speed, according to the Financial Times.
					
					 Whenever the U.S. toughens sanctions against the DPRK, the latter will display the advantages of economy of its own style before the world.
					
					 When what visitors to the DPRK said are put together, there is conclusion that its people's living standard is improving and economy is undergoing revitalization.
					
					 As some Western countries admit, the DPRK is, no doubt, making rapid progress under the guidance of HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 But, regretfully, most of world media are citing the reports of Western media slandering the DPRK.
					
					 Western countries desire "change of situation" in the DPRK, but it's a big mistake.
					
					 They should opt for dialogue with the DPRK, or else it will take a step to redress the military balance in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: MINREX aconseja a EE.UU. sacar lecciones del incidente de valija diplomatica
articles.content:
MINREX aconseja a EE.UU. sacar lecciones del incidente de valija diplomatica
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por la ACNC en relacion con que EE.UU. pidio disculpas por el caso de arrebato de la valija diplomatica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sucedido en Nueva York, y la devolvio, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 18 la siguiente respuesta:
					Como ya trascendidos, debido a la provocacion ilegal de EE.UU., ha sido arrebatada el 16 de junio en el Aeropuerto Kennedy de Nueva York la valija diplomatica de la delegacion de la RPDC que estaba en el trayecto de regreso tras participar en la sesion de la Conferencia de Paises Partidarios del Convenio de Derechos de las Personas con Discapacidades, efectuada en Nueva York.
					
					Hemos condenado severamente el caso como una imperdonable violacion a la soberania y una brutal provocacion contra la RPDC y urgimos fuertemente a EE.UU. dar explicaciones al respecto y pedir disculpas oficiales a nivel de gobierno.
					
					En la reunion del comite de relaciones con el pais sede de la ONU, convocada segun nuestra propuesta, el representante de Chipre, presidente del comite, y los otros de numerosos paises como China, Rusia, Cuba y Siria reconocieron que el arrebato de valija diplomatica resulta grave e imperdonable siendo una violacion de la soberania de un pais.
					
					En cuanto al incidente, el Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. reconocio los errores de los funcionarios de seguridad y pidio disculpas de manera oficial en nombre del gobierno estadounidense expresando la esperanza de que la RPDC tomara en cuenta que tales errores fueron cometidos por la inestabilidad de seguridad interior de EE.UU. y la demasiada nerviosidad de esos funcionarios.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, devolvio toda la valija diplomatica a la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. debe sacar lecciones de este caso y dejar de atentar contra la soberania de otros paises en violacion de las leyes y reglas internacionales.

articles.title: Ryu Myong Son conversa con el primer subsecretario general de partido irani
articles.content:
Ryu Myong Son conversa con el primer subsecretario general de partido irani
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 17 las conversaciones entre el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ryu Myong Son, quien realiza una visita a la Republica Islamica de Iran en calidad de jefe de la delegacion del PTC, y el primer subsecretario general del Partido de Coalicion Islamica de Iran, Seyed Mehdi Joulaee.
					Tras referirse al exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14" que tuvo lugar bajo la direccion directa del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, el jefe de la delegacion coreana dijo que el PTC y el pueblo coreano defienden firmemente la soberania del pais y crean los milagros sin precedentes en la construccion de potencia socialista con el poderio de la unidad monolitica y la capacidad de autodefensa.
					
					Evaluo que el Partido de Coalicion Islamica de Iran se enfrenta con intransigencia a la sancion y presion de EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales.
					
					Resalto la necesidad de desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos partidos, establecidas en la lucha conjunta por la independencia antiimperialista.
					
					El primer subsecretario general del partido irani recordo el encuentro del Presidente Kim Il Sung con el lider de la Revolucion Islamica de Iran, Seyed Ali Khamenei, quien estaba de visita en Corea, y apunto que se han venido ampliando y desarrollando sin cesar las relaciones de amistad entre dos partidos y dos paises.
					
					La visita presente de la delegacion del PTC sirve de un testimonio del apoyo y solidaridad con Iran, recalco y asevero que el pueblo irani luchara junto con el pueblo coreano contra las maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento de Estados Unidos y el Occidente.
					
					Dijo que Iran esta muy complacido por el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del ICBM realizado en Corea y expuso la firme voluntad de desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos.
					
					El mismo dia, la delegacion del PTC fue invitada al banquete ofrecido por el primer subsecretario general del partido irani.

articles.title: Noticia de competencias de calificacion de grupo G para Campeonato Sub-23 de CAF
articles.content:
Noticia de competencias de calificacion de grupo G para Campeonato Sub-23 de CAF
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Se entablaron el dia 19 en el capitalino Estadio Primero de Mayo las competencias de calificacion por grupos para el Campeonato Sub-23 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2018.
					  Los resultados de las competencias del primer dia son los siguientes:
					
					  RPDC :   Hong Kong de China   1:1
					
					  Laos  :   Taipei China         3:1

articles.title: Otorgados titulos academicos y grados docentes a intelectuales ameritados
articles.content:
Otorgados titulos academicos y grados docentes a intelectuales ameritados
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Fueron otorgados los titulos academicos y grados docentes a los intelectuales que contribuyeron a la construccion de la potencia economica y al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo.
					Se otorgo el titulo de Academico a Kim Ji Yong, decano del Instituto Superior de Ciencias Naturales, y el de candidato a Academico, a Han Chung Hwan, profesor del Instituto Superior de Medicina de Pyongyang de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, y Jon Ha Chol, director de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales.
					
					La categoria de Profesor Titular correspondio a Pyon Kyu Sun, rector del Instituto Superior Pedagogico Kim Hyong Jik; a Jon Ji Hyon, decano de la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek; a Han Song Nam, jefe de catedra del Instituto Superior de Arte Dramatico y Cinematografico de Pyongyang, y otros.
					
					El doctorado se concedio a Jin Jae Gyong, jefe de catedra de la Universidad Kim Il Sung; Kim Ui Song, investigador del Instituto Superior de Medicina de Pyongyang de la Universidad Kim Il Sung; Yu Song Chol, jefe de catedra del Instituto Superior Pedagogico Kim Hyong Jik; Ho Nam Chol, decano del Instituto Superior Pedagogico Kim Chol Ju; Han Pok Nam, jefe de catedra de la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek; Kim Kyong Chol, subdecano de la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang, y otros.
					
					126 personas recibieron el titulo de subprofesor titular y otras 878, el titulo de licenciado.
					
					La ceremonia de otorgamiento tuvo lugar el dia 19 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo.

articles.title: Enterrados nuevos restos en el cementerio de martires
articles.content:
Enterrados nuevos restos en el cementerio de martires 
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de la victoria del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, fueron enterrados nuevamente en el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria los restos de los martires caidos en la lucha por la libertad e independencia de la patria y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Songun.
					Los heroes de la Republica Yun Hi Chon y Ri Hung Gyu derribaron muchos aviones enemigos mediante el movimiento de equipos de cazadores de aviones.
					
					Hasta el ultimo momento de su vida, ellos apoyaron con armas la idea y la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y cumplieron satisfactoriamente con su mision y deber de precursores de la revolucion y educadores.
					
					Entre esos martires figura tambien el heroe Jo Myong Su quien sirviendo en el organo de seguridad interior del distrito de Ongjin durante la guerra coreana, capturo a mas de 420 espias y saboteadores y les incauto muchas armas y municiones.
					
					Fueron enterrados igualmente los restos mortales de las esposas de los martires Yun Hi Chon, Ri Hung Gyu, Jo Myong Su, Choe Un Hong, Jon Ki Ryon, Jo Pyong Gi, Cha Yun Chan, Kim Yong Gu, Ryang In Gil, Hong Sung Chol, Hwang Pyong Song, Kim Won Jin y Ro Song Chil.
					
					Tuvieron lugar el dia 19 las ceremonias de entierro en el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
